definition: to play the xiao 簫|箫[xiao1] (mouth organ)/to beg while playing pipes; cf politician Wu Zixu 伍子胥[Wu3 Zi3 xu1], c. 520 BC destitute refugee in Wu town, 吳市吹簫|吴市吹箫[Wu2 shi4 chui1 xiao1]/to busk/virtuoso piper wins a beauty, cf 玉人吹簫|玉人吹箫[yu4 ren2 chui1 xiao1]/(slang) fellatio/blowjob
to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through
xiao, a Chinese musical instrument of ancient times, similar to panpipes
to beg while playing the xiao 箫 (mouth organ)/cf Wu Zixu 伍子胥, destitute refugee from Chu 楚, busked in Wu town c. 520 BC, then became a powerful politician
to beg while playing the xiao 箫 (mouth organ)/cf Wu Zixu 伍子胥, destitute refugee from Chu 楚, busked in Wu town c. 520 BC, then became a powerful politician
virtuoso piper wins a beauty/the xiao 箫 (mouth organ) virtuoso 萧史 won for his wife the beautiful daughter of Duke Mu of Qin 秦穆公

sentences.english: And a girl, and she was giving him a blowjob .
sentences.chinese: 和個女孩兒，她在爲他吹簫。

sentences.english: His brother's name was Jubal ; he was the ancestor of all who play the lyre and the pipe.
sentences.chinese: 他的弟弟名叫猶巴耳，他是所有彈琴吹簫者的始祖。

definition: a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
(literary) crisscross/uneven/disorderly/rim of the eye/variant of 欄杆|栏杆[lan2 gan1]
fabled island in Eastern sea, abode of immortals/same as Penglai 蓬萊|蓬莱
